frameset.edef: to tense, to strain or tighten

example.parse: (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG حالَة) (NP (DET+NOUN الرُعْب))) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON اِللِّي)) (S (NP-PRD (NOUN عَنْد) (NP (POSS_PRON_3P هُم))) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (NP (PRON_3FS هِيَّ))) (SBAR-NOM-PRD (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON اِللِّي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS وَتَّرِت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (PVSUFF_DO:3P هُم))))) (CONJ وِ) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-4 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS خَلِّت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (S (NP-TPC-3 (PVSUFF_DO:3P هُم)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART ما)) (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يحِلُّوا) (PRT (NEG_PART ش)) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-ADV (ADJ كُوَيِّس))))))))))))
